Title: The Smile
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa, Howard Gordon
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin, David Harewood
Plot: An asset from Carrie's former life comes in from the cold. Freshman Congressman Nick Brody discovers that Abu Nazir may not be content with his nonviolent approach to affecting change in American foreign policy.
